response.summary: Electrical Engineer, with more than twelve years in professional experience, profile oriented to planning, development, construction, desing,  project evaluation and project commissioning of electrical systems at different levels of voltage. With a background in developing projects based on PMI standard. Proficient with international codes, standards and recommended practice standards like IEEE, NEC, ANSI, NEMA, UL, API, etc. Proficient in Microsoft Office programs, programing software and SAP. Whit Postgraduate studies Transmission and Distribution of electrical power, and, in Finance.
response.skills: Coordinación de proyectos, Diseño, Capacidad de análisis, Ingeniería, Energía, Ingeniería de proyectos, Puesta en marcha, Gestión de proyectos, Planeamiento de proyectos, Ingeniería eléctrica, Microsoft Office, Aprovisionamiento, Generación de energía eléctrica

profile_positions.description: Responsible for supervising all team members, and they provide recommendations and technical support on electrical engineering reviews, strategic plans, and projects.
profile_positions.title: Lead Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Technical Office of the Solar PV San Fernando Project with a capacity of 60,8 MWp. 
Assist other engineers, team members, and supervisor by developing, compiling, and providing technical data
Interprets and applies applicable codes and regulations. 
Research and prepare major material purchase specifications for equipment. 
Identify requirements for new standards, draft the standards and manage their development and implementation. 
Provide technical guidance to distribution system design and construction departments. 
Develop, publish, and distribute construction specification books to ensure all system construction will meet strength and clearance requirements and to minimize construction costs, while meeting standards and codes. 
Provide support to assigned technical committees and committee leadership that develop electric standards. 
Update and manage databases as required.
profile_positions.title: Senior Electrical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description: Prepares the commissioning dossiers. supervises commissioning field activities, ensures safe execution of all commissioning activities through the application of the work permit procedure, coordinates activities of vendor representatives and subcontractors, managing smooth commissioning of the project by coordinating between the company and the contractor; etc.
profile_positions.title: Specialized Electrical Engineer Commisioning

profile_positions.description:
Participating in the Final Acceptance Testing (FAT), Manage and monitoring bugs / defects equipment. Participating with engineering groups, project management team, purchasing, inspection and customer to ensure customer spec requirements are integrated into the Engineering and Vendor data documents of supplied products.

Provide QA/QC support to all Frontera Energy projects as assigned. Support entails but it is not limited to risk management, quality reporting, audit management and other project related activities. Compile and maintain detailed project Quality Assurance and Quality Control Plans. Serve as Quality representative for client and 3rd party inspection site audits/meetings/visits and coordinate with Quality Control for witnessing a test.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Engineering/project cost estimates and schedules
•	Lead in the execution of engineering activities.
•	Equipment specifications for procurement and/or factory acceptance testing
•	Develop and improve processes, tools and/or technology implementations
•	Provide short term field support during construction
•	Conduct inspections, prepare simple designs, calculate data, prepare cost estimates, project updates and daily work records.
•	Collaborates with other departments and/or companies within the ENEL group, as well as third parties, to assess commercial and technical feasibility of projects: collecting, analyzing and interpreting data, creating specifications, preparing proposals, implementing solutions
profile_positions.title: Senior Electrical Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Quality Assurance of Engineering - Electrical Contractor Engineer full time in ECOPETROL S.A. 

Design of electrical facilities in the Oil and Gas industry. Review of design for existing system, modification detailed design/engineering on site and protectively identify problems, non-conformance items and actions to be make
profile_positions.title: Junior Electrical Engineer

company.name: Hatch
company.description:
Our organization is passionately committed to the pursuit of a better world through positive change. We embrace your visions as our own and partner with you to develop better ideas that are smarter, more efficient, and innovative. Our global network of 10,000 professionals work on the world’s toughest challenges. Our corporate roots extend back more than a hundred years, and our experience spans over 150 countries around the world in the metals, energy, infrastructure, digital, and investments market sectors.

We are employee-owned and independent—free to bring our best thinking to your business. Our exceptional, diverse teams combine vast engineering and business knowledge, working in partnership with our clients to develop market strategies, manage and optimize production, develop new game-changing technologies, and design and deliver complex capital projects.

We work closely with the communities in which we serve to ensure that our solutions optimize environmental protection, economic prosperity, and cultural vibrancy. We want their businesses, ecosystems, and communities to thrive, both now and into the future.

Our people are passionate about our corporate purpose and values. We believe in long-term relationships with our partners, and are committed to our clients’ lasting success.

We are “entrepreneurs with a technical soul.”
